name: MetroidJam
description:
MetroidJam

This is metroidvania game that I developed for metroidvania month.

However, I missed that date by just a little bit :). But I still wanted to finish it to a point where I can upload it.

Gameplay:

There are 4 bosses and your goal is to make your way through the world to kill them all.

There may be future updates for things like the world, boss battles, and more but is not guaranteed. 

Its recommended to play the game in fullscreen mode.
